en_definition: a raised line of water that moves across the surface of the sea, ocean, etc.
a person who has been attacked, or killed as the result of a crime, disease, an accident, etc.
a regular rise and fall of the sea
to be so full that the contents go over the sides
a flying insect that bites humans and animals and sucks their blood
used to describe somebody who is the same as you in some way, or in the same situation
a way of referring to a man or boy
to say that something will happen in the future
far away in space or time
the fact of having a place to live or stay, considered as a basic human need
to formally suggest that somebody should be chosen for an important role, prize, position, etc.
the strong feeling that you have when you think something that happened is bad and unfair
the feeling of being annoyed for failure
to keep a particular quality, feature, etc. to make sure that something is kept
a person in your family who lived a long time ago
to be a danger to something
to say that you will cause trouble, hurt somebody if you don't get what you want
traditional and typical of the ordinary people of a country or community
people in general
used to say that a particular situation or state will always exist
to tell somebody about something, especially in an official way
despite something that you have just mentioned
connected with the place where you have always lived or lived for a long time
connected with the place where you were born and lived for the first years of your life
everything you can see when you look across a large area of land, especially in the country
connected with seeing or sight
an object such as a piece of furniture that is old and often valuable
a building where people go to drink and meet their friends
connected with or like the countryside
connected with a town or city
not decorated or complicated; simple
a duty to deal with or take care of somebody / something, so that you may be blamed if something goes wrong
of many different types
zh_definition: 各种各样的；形形色色的

en_definition: a series of musical notes that are sung or played in a particular order to form a piece of music
a woman on her wedding day, or just before or just after it
zh_definition: 新娘；即将（或刚刚）结婚的女子

en_definition: a man on his wedding day, or just before or just after it
zh_definition: 新郎；即将（或刚刚）结婚的男子

en_definition: to have something good such as ability, great happiness, etc.
zh_definition: 享有（幸福等）；赋有（能力等）

en_definition: beautiful handwriting done with a special pen or brush
the way in which the parts of something are connected together, arranged or organized; a particular arrangement of parts
clear and accurate

to support something publicly
to treat things that have been used so that they can be used again
a container that you put waste in
existing or happening over a large area or among many people
zh_definition: 分布广的；普遍的；广泛的

en_definition: what you intend or plan to do; your aim
doing something well thoroughly with no waste of energy
a formal arrangement to meet somebody at a particular time, especially for a reason connected with their work
a person whose job is to take care of people's teeth
to jump over a rope which is held at both ends by yourself or by two other people
a competition in which people try to win something
an outdoor meal or party when food is cooked over an open fire
waste food, paper, etc. that you throw away

an official rule that says that something is not allowed

a way of entering or reaching a place
a room for several people to sleep in, especially in a school or other institution
a particular attitude towards something; a way of thinking about something
to protect somebody / something from attack
violent behaviour that is intended to hurt or kill somebody
to take part in a series of planned activities, for example to win an election
a series of planned activities that are intended to achieve a social or commercial aim

en_definition: to use as little of something as possible so that it lasts a long time
the place where a particular type of animal or plant is normally found
a short piece of writing on a particular subject
completely sure about something
(of attitudes, views, etc.) very different from each other
a long running race of about 42 kilometres

to pay the costs of a particular event
a strong feeling of excitement and interest in something and a desire to become involved in it
worth doing
to completely change the appearance or character of somebody / something, especially so that it is better
to change the form of something
to put your arms or legs out straight and tighten your muscles
to make something longer, wider or looser; to become longer

a straight tree with a mass of long leaves at the top, growing in tropical countries
completely clear and bright
the white juice of coconut
a person who is involved in a subject, issue, etc. and makes it easier for ordinary people to understand and have sympathy with it
zh_definition: （某主题、话题等的）标志性人物

en_definition: a description of what the weather will be like tomorrow or for the next few days
a race between teams in which each member of the team runs or swims one section of the race
